caption.p: Pairwise F ST (Â± 95 % confidence interval) between native Mexican (Me) and invasive populations of P. juliflora in Ethiopia (Et), Kenya (Ke) and Tanzania (Tz); between invasive populations of P. juliflora; between native populations from Peru (Pe) and invasive populations from Hawaii (Hw) and introduced populations from Kenya (Ke) and between Ke and Hw populations of P. pallida.
